org.seedstack.business.modelmapper

Class ModelMapperTupleAssembler<T extends org.javatuples.Tuple,D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.seedstack.business.assembler.BaseTupleAssembler<T,D>
      • org.seedstack.business.modelmapper.ModelMapperTupleAssembler<T,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the tuple.
    D - the type of the DTO.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Assembler<T,D>

    public abstract class ModelMapperTupleAssembler<T extends org.javatuples.Tuple,D>
extends BaseTupleAssembler<T,D>
    This class can be extended to declare an assembler that is able to automatically map a tuple of aggregates to a DTO and back. It delegates the mapping to a ModelMapper instance.

    • Method Detail

      • createDtoFromAggregate

        public D createDtoFromAggregate(T sourceAggregate)
        Description copied from interface: Assembler
        Creates a new DTO and merge the given aggregate into it. Method Assembler.createDto() is called to create the DTO instance, then Assembler.mergeAggregateIntoDto(Object, Object) is called to do the merge.
        Parameters:
        sourceAggregate - the source aggregate.
        Returns:
        the resulting dto.

      • mergeAggregateIntoDto

        public void mergeAggregateIntoDto(T sourceAggregate,
                                  D targetDto)
        Description copied from interface: Assembler
        Merge a source aggregate into an existing target DTO.
        Parameters:
        sourceAggregate - the source aggregate.
        targetDto - the target dto.

      • mergeDtoIntoAggregate

        public void mergeDtoIntoAggregate(D sourceDto,
                                  T targetAggregate)
        Description copied from interface: Assembler
        Merges a source DTO into an existing target aggregate root.
        Parameters:
        sourceDto - the source dto.
        targetAggregate - the target aggregate.

      • configure

        protected abstract void configure(org.modelmapper.ModelMapper modelMapper)
        This method is called once when the first mapping of the assembler occurs. It allows to configure the ModelMapper instance that will be used for mapping. This instance will then be reused for subsequent calls.
        Parameters:
        modelMapper - the ModelMapper instance to configure.
